Video Series

Our seven part video series "Running a Lego Robotics Camp" is available on YouTube. In these videos, we cover all crucial aspects of running Lego Camp. Our videos are:

  1. Why run a camp?
  2. Overview: A Week in the Life
  3. Collecting Resources and Planning Camp
  4. Orienting yourself to the EV3
  5. Challenges
  6. Creating your own challenge table
  7. Camp Financials
